Email marketing platform for delivering: Plateforme de marketing électronique pour la diffusion de campagnes e-mail exceptionnelles.
\nTo use Campaign Monitor, you need to g:
To use Campaign Monitor, you need to get an API key:
1. Login to your account at https://www.campaignmonitor.com.
2. Navigate to Account Settings.
3. Click on API Keys.
4. Create a new API key or use an existing one.
